title: Near Medical District, Granite, Hardwood Floors, Stainless Steel
posting_body: Perfectly situated near Downtown in Near Southside, or the Hospital /Medical area, you're only a boot scoot away from all that Fort Worth has to offer!
Home to where cattle barons once roamed, rehabilitated homes and historic buildings, this area has no shortage of history and culture.
Less than 10 minutes (traffic cooperating) to Sundance Square in downtown Fort Worth, where you'll find amazing culture, food, live music and cold drinks.
About 10 minutes to Camp Bowie Boulevard, which offers 30 blocks of shopping, dining, and galleries.
Fitness Center with Free Weights  Yoga Area
Parking Garage with Controlled Access Garage with Elevator Access
Clubroom with Catering Kitchen for Events
Coffee Bar and Wi-Fi Available for Residents in the Clubroom
